headline: IDEX Corporation to Webcast First Quarter 2025 Earnings Call
summary: NORTHBROOK, Ill., April 14, 2025--IDEX Corporation (NYSE:IEX) announced today that it will release its first quarter 2025 results on Thursday, May 1, 2025, prior to market open. An investor conference call and webcast will take place at 8:00 a.m. (CT) that same day with Chief Executive Officer and President Eric Ashleman and Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer Abhi Khandelwal.
